TextLibrary.Text: Elistara
Now that Skullguard Keep is secure, the Mages' Council wishes to look into the lands beyond.
Now that Skullguard Keep is secure, the Mages' Council wishes to look into the lands beyond.

Now that Skullguard Keep is secure, the Mages' Council wishes to look into the lands beyond.
Do you need some scouts?
Do you need some scouts?
Do you need some scouts?
Do you need some scouts?
My people have no need for scouts - we use magic for such tasks.
My people have no need for scouts - we use magic for such tasks.
My people have no need for scouts - we use magic for such tasks.
My people have no need for scouts - we use magic for such tasks.
How can I help? Anything they find is of interest to me, because I will soon head into the Realms of Death in search of Lord Bane.
How can I help? Anything they find is of interest to me, because I will soon head into the Realms of Death in search of Lord Bane.
How can I help? Anything they find is of interest to me, because I will soon head into the Realms of Death in search of Lord Bane.
How can I help? Anything they find is of interest to me, because I will soon head into the Realms of Death in search of Lord Bane.
Perhaps sooner than you think. The Mages need some herbs to cast the farseeing spells that enable them to look into Lord Bane's Realm. Those herbs can only be found over the pass.

Okay. Is there anything you can tell me about the lands there?
Okay. Is there anything you can tell me about the lands there?
Okay. Is there anything you can tell me about the lands there?
Okay. Is there anything you can tell me about the lands there?
You have already met his undead minions, but you should also beware of the Arboleth.
You have already met his undead minions, but you should also beware of the Arboleth.
You have already met his undead minions, but you should also beware of the Arboleth.
You have already met his undead minions, but you should also beware of the Arboleth.
What's an Arboleth?
What's an Arboleth?
What's an Arboleth?
What's an Arboleth?
They are misshapen creatures, products of Lord Bane's twisted experiments. They roam the lands beyond the pass freely and attack anyone that happens by. They are highly resistant to magic.
They are misshapen creatures, products of Lord Bane's twisted experiments. They roam the lands beyond the pass freely and attack anyone that happens by. They are highly resistant to magic.

Very well. If you show me the location of these herbs on my map, I'll cross the mountains and find them for you.
